description: The file 'cli.py' provides a command-line interface for the Universal Project Initializer, allowing users to specify project parameters and initiate project creation for various project types. It includes argument parsing, parameter processing, and functions to produce a JSON output summarizing the operation.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration object representing project settings, created from CLI args.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enum-like class representing different project types with a method to instantiate from string.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Container for project initialization template information, including commands and environment configs.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for creating templates and initializing projects based on config.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from parsed CLI arguments.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts TemplateInitInfo object into a dict suitable for JSON serialization, converting paths to absolute.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats and outputs the result as JSON, indicating success or failure.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point for the CLI application; parses arguments, creates project template, and starts project initialization.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
